short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some addons and utils for Twitch viewers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Popout context menu:
Adds context menu to Twitch links.

Popout windows title changer:
Changes title of chat and player popouts, also adds link to channel in chat header.

Player controls:
Do actions on keys presses.

Chat features:
Changes timestamp format, adds timestamp to notification in chat.
Shows in chat "Stream up", "Stream down" notify.
Auto claim community points bonus.
Auto leave raids.
